name: MEC Boundary Light Down Jacket - Men's
description:
Designed for day hiking and base camp wear, the Boundary is lightweight, durable and very packable. Zip it into its own pocket and stash it in your pack when you're on the move, then bring it out for ridge-top snacks. With bold colour-clocking, this jacket also works well for everyday urban wear during the shoulder seasons.Fabric is ripstop nylon with a water repellent finish.Quilted construction.Insulated with 700 fill-power duck down that meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare.Internal insulated storm flap/chin guard keeps cold air out.Elastic cuffs.2 zippered handwarmer pockets give you plenty of storage space.Zippered internal pocket doubles as a stuff sack.Drawcord hem allows you to adjust fit and seal out drafts.Drop hem design for a bit of extra length in back.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
